Delhi.name: Central Delhi
Delhi.description: Administrative and historic hub of Delhi.

Delhi.name: East Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and commercial areas with Ghazipur and Mayur Vihar.

Delhi.name: New Delhi
Delhi.description: Capital area with Parliament, Rashtrapati Bhavan, and embassies.

Delhi.name: North Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and educational district with markets.

Delhi.name: North East Delhi
Delhi.description: Densely populated district with residential areas.

Delhi.name: Shahdara
Delhi.description: Commercial and residential district in East Delhi.

Delhi.name: South Delhi
Delhi.description: Upscale residential areas and historic monuments.

Delhi.name: South East Delhi
Delhi.description: Industrial and residential areas with connectivity to Noida.

Delhi.name: South West Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential district with urban and rural mix.

Delhi.name: West Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and commercial district with markets.
